message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE

This paper discusses optimizations for training deep learning models at petaFLOPS scale, which involves both algorithmic and systems software challenges. The focus is on image classification, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also discusses distributed batch normalization, input pipeline optimizations, and 2-D torus all-reduce, which are related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.DC, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.NE, in that order.
